abstract:
At room temperature, SARS-CoV-2 was stable on environmental surfaces and remained viable up to 7 days on smooth surfaces. This virus could survive for several hours in feces and 3-4 days in urine.
Competing Interest Statement
The authors have declared no competing interest.
author: Jingwan Han; Yongjian Liu; Yongqiang Deng; Tianyi Li; Lin Li; Lei Jia; Jingyun Li; Dong Zhang; Xiaolin Wang; Siyang Liu; Zhuchun Bei; Yusen Zhou; Hanping Li
title: Stability of SARS-CoV-2 on environmental surfaces and in human excreta
